Posts.title: The Economy is collapsing in Tunisia
Posts.body: The Economy in Tunisia has been suffering for the past 10 years when the revolution started, since then the terrorism has been striking, even though we didn't witness any lately, we hope that Tunisia recovers fast and heal from all this corruption it is suffering.

Posts.title: Bill Gates says Microsoft shares' prices have increadsed 20%
Posts.body: After the release of the new XBOX series, the value of Microsoft shares have skyrocketed,  "Gaming is the future" says the founder and owner of Microsoft , the gaming industry is witnessing a huge profit.

Posts.title: Kais Saied visits the new Hospital in Sfax
Posts.body: Today the Tunisian President went to visit the newly made hospital in Sfax built by the Chinese Ambassador as a gift from the Great China to Tunisia, this hospital is equipped with the best tools to assure that patients will get the best treatment possible especially with the appearance of Covid-19.
